rev.desc.rev.desc: Hua: change so that only update assignment group that has the deleted user in the group

I made a change to trigger.operator.delete because the next panel still had the normal exit to remove.mgr, which was removed. So I changed the normal exit to update.assign. I updated SCR 34839 Task 31668 with this information.
removed the following panels: delete.custom, delete.options, delete.offhours, delete.resexp, delete ... and removed the sql expression lines on the start panel that referenced wd tables
Added triggers to delete work management files when an operator is deleted.

descript.descript: Hua: change so that only update assignment group that has the deleted user in the group

I made a change to trigger.operator.delete because the next panel still had the normal exit to remove.mgr, which was removed. So I changed the normal exit to update.assign. I updated SCR 34839 Task 31668 with this information.
removed the following panels: delete.custom, delete.options, delete.offhours, delete.resexp, delete ... and removed the sql expression lines on the start panel that referenced wd tables
Added triggers to delete work management files when an operator is deleted.
